articles.title: UK has given nearly 140,000 people COVID shots, minister says - Reuters UK
articles.description: Nearly 140,000 people in the United Kingdom have received their first COVID-19 shots in the first week of roll-out of the vaccine developed by Pfizer and BioNTech, the minister in charge of the programme said on Wednesday.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: A patient receives the first of two injections with a dose of the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine in a surgery in Wolverhampton, Britain December 14, 2020. REUTERS/Carl… [+1331 chars]
